aboutMe.1: I am an ambitious young person eager to acquire new knowledge and experience in the IT industry. I became interested in programming and creating websites and web applications at the beginning of technical school, and since then I have been learning new things, languages, and technologies, working on projects that can be seen in my repositories.
aboutMe.2: I hold a technician degree in IT and am currently studying computer science at the Silesian University of Technology. I am looking for a job where I can develop my skills and gain new ones with the help of more experienced professionals. So far, I have worked mostly in frontend development, creating several websites that are still active today, but I would also like to expand into backend development.
aboutMe.3: This website serves as my online CV to describe and showcase both my skills and experience. Below, I also include a contact form allowing you to reach me by email, as well as my CV in the form of a standard PDF file.

places.title: Silesian University of Technology in Gliwice (2023 - present)
Techniczne Zakłady Naukowe w Częstochowie (Technical Secondary School) (2019-2023)
EduPlus – Two-week Erasmus+ internship
places.description: Internship where I was developing applications using Windows Forms technology in an English-speaking team

places.title: Jupiter – School of Frontend and Game Development (2021 - 2023)

Frontend.CSS: I can style websites using both native CSS and the SCSS preprocessor. I am proficient in creating responsive web pages and familiar with the Bootstrap library.
Frontend.HTML: I am familiar with and can use many HTML elements such as lists, tables, and many more. I also understand meta tags and can create well-structured web pages, for example, by following the BEM methodology.
Frontend.JS: I know the syntax and built-in functions of JavaScript (loops, arrays, conditional statements, basic object-oriented concepts). I can manipulate the DOM using standard JavaScript or jQuery, render the DOM using JSON data fetched from a public API.

Backend.CPP: I am familiar with C++ syntax and functions. I can handle file operations and understand the basics of object-oriented programming.
Backend.Python: I have knowledge of fundamental Python functions such as conditionals, loops, list operations, text file handling, and writing my own functions.
Backend.SQL: I can use basic SQL commands such as SELECT, UPDATE, and WHERE. I know how to filter and sort data. I am capable of connecting a website to a database and handling it using PHP.

skills.React: I am proficient in working with the React library, developing functional components, writing modular code, and understanding JSX syntax. A good example of my work in React is this website, which was built using this library. For styling, I used the React-Bootstrap library, which provides ready-to-use React components with built-in Bootstrap styles. I also used the Vite tool to create this project.

OtherSkills: Github - basic knowledge of the platform and related console commands
Photoshop - basic knowledge of the program and the ability to modify graphics
Courses: Udemy: Zaawansowane projekty w CSS i JavaScript (Samuraj Programowania)

SWAPI.title: Star Wars API
SWAPI.description: Site that gets data from API and puts it on the table, made with JavaScript and Bootstrap.
SWAPI.description2: Site that gets data from API and puts them into dynamically generated table. I made it with JavaScript and for styling I used Bootstrap. Project was made to show my abilities in working with public API. Website has menu in which you can choose if you want to get information about characters, or planets from Star Wars universe.

ticTacToe.title: React Tic-Tac-Toe
ticTacToe.description: Tic-Tac-Toe game made in react for two persons.
ticTacToe.description2: Basic Tic Tac Toe game for two persons that I made in React. It uses basic things that comes with React like states. I added history of players moves under game board.

nightSky.title: Night Sky
nightSky.description: Small canvas project that shows night sky with stars and random generated constellations.
nightSky.description2: Small canvas project that shows night sky with stars and randomly generated constellations with them. For this project I was mainly using canvas with JavaScript.
